scenario: Simulates a real human navigating a website with organic, variable delays between requests and natural path exploration (e.g., homepage → category pages → subpages → back to homepage).

patterns.pathSequence: home → category → subcategory → back to home (natural browsing)

reasoning: Human behavior exhibits unpredictable delays (e.g., 5s pause after a subpage load) and follows non-linear navigation paths (e.g., returning to homepage after exploring). The mix of short/long delays and organic path exploration aligns with real user behavior, unlike scripted bots that use fixed intervals or rigid sequences.
